alert.note: Alert for Camden; Dent; Maries; Miller; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 9:30PM CDT until August 02 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maries County in central Missouri... Northwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Miller County in central Missouri... Northern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Phelps County in east central Missouri... East central Camden County in central Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. James, or near Rolla, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, St. James, Dixon, Belle, Crocker, Iberia, Doolittle, Vienna, Newburg, Saint Elizabeth, St. Elizabeth, Tuscumbia, Eugene, Brumley, Brinktown, Ulman, Vichy, Lake Spring and Northwye. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 166 and 169, and between mile markers 171 and 200. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Dent; Maries; Miller; Phelps; Pulaski
